name: Negative-G
description:
Controls :

press DOWN arrow key to activate jet pack

press LEFT arrow key to move left

press RIGHT arrow key to move right

Press SPACE to restart

Story:

For the first time humans have discovered a planet with negative gravity.

This negative gravity will push you away from the planet's surface.

Use your special jet pack to survive in this planet.

Created by:

Rahal Ranasinghe

Nisal Perera

https://github.com/rahalrsh/NegativeG
